name: FurAffinity - Project Fursona!
description: Project Fursona is a style for FurAffinity inspired by Persona. It is compatible with both the dark and default styles of FurAffinity.
additional_info:
The skin is based on "FurAffinity - Grey Rust" ( https://userstyles.org/styles/98676/furaffinity-grey-rust ) made by Artex. ( http://www.furaffinity.net/user/artex./ ).

If you'd like to leave a shout on my profile or to ask for something, you can find me here: http://www.furaffinity.net/user/cuteness-overlord/
